title: Cows in UP wearing masks? Here’s the truth behind this picture with CM Adityanath | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the Coronavirus scare, a picture of Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister, Yogi Adityanath, is doing rounds on social media in which he can be seen with cows that are wearing masks.

ALSO READ: Don’t believe this picture of PM Modi taking a dip in…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture in a news report by Hindustan Times.

According to the caption, the picture was taken when Adityanath fed cows at a gaushala in UP’s Gorakhpur.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that masks on cows’ face were superimposed using photo editing software.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
